snippet: At least three Armenian soldiers were killed in clashes with troops from Azerbaijan on Thursday near the breakaway region of Nagorno-Karabakh, but the two sides gave conflicting accounts about who was to blame.
abstract: Armenia and Azerbaijan clash over separatist region of Nagorno-Karabakh, and at least three Armenian soldiers are killed.
lead_paragraph: At least three Armenian soldiers were killed in clashes with troops from Azerbaijan on Thursday near the breakaway region of Nagorno-Karabakh, but the two sides gave conflicting accounts about who was to blame.

headline.main: Armenia and Azerbaijan Clash Over Separatist Region
headline.print_headline: Europe; Armenia and Azerbaijan Clash Over Separatist Region
